AppDB.Name: LATENCY_INGRESS_MAX_REPORT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: ingress latency table which holds information on the MAX ingress latency packets measured

AppDB.Name: LATENCY_EGRESS_MAX_REPORT
AppDB.OneLineDescription: egress latency table which holds information on the MAX "end to end" latency packets measured

AppDB.Name: LATENCY_INGRESS_PROFILE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: table defines the ingress latency properties for a given profile

AppDB.Name: LATENCY_INGRESS_PROBABILITY_MARK
AppDB.OneLineDescription: table defines the ingress latency properties for probabilistic marking drop/cni

AppDB.Name: LATENCY_INGRESS_PROFILE_BINS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: table defines the ingress latency bins thresholds for a given profile

AppDB.Name: LATENCY_EGRESS_PROFILE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: table defines the engress (enf to end) latency properties for a given profile

AppDB.Name: LATENCY_EGRESS_PROFILE_BINS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: table defines the egress (enf to end) latency bins thresholds for a given profile

AppDB.Name: LATENCY_END_TO_END_CONFIG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: general configuration for end to end latency measurements

AppDB.Name: LATENCY_VOQ_QUARTET_PROFILE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: mapping table from quartet queue (base of 4 queues) to a profile

AppDB.Name: LATENCY_VOQ_QUARTET_PROFILE_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: mapping table from voq quartet profile to {tc_map(3), latency_flow-profile(3)}

AppDB.Name: LATENCY_VOQ_DISCARD_PARAMS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table contains mapping from free-res thresholds to VOQ latency drop.

AppDB.Name: LATENCY_VOQ_RANGES
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table defines VOQ latency range thresholds

AppDB.Name: LATENCY_VOQ_RJCT_SETTINGS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table defines VOQ latency filter MC/filter SNIFF/flow control settings

AppDB.Name: LATENCY_EGRESS_DROP_CNI_PROFILE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: table defines the engress (enf to end) latency properties for DROP/CNI profile

AppDB.Name: LATENCY_EGRESS_L4Q_PROFILE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: table defines the engress latency per DropCNI Flow id

AppDB.Name: LATENCY_EGRESS_L4Q_MAP_AQM_FLOW_ID_PORT_TC
AppDB.OneLineDescription: table defines the mapping per out tm port and tc to L4Q flow id

AppDB.Name: LATENCY_EGRESS_L4Q_MAP_AQM_FLOW_ID_TO_PROFILE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: table defines the mapping of L4Q flow id to L4Q flow profile

AppDB.Name: LATENCY_EGRESS_PACKET_CLASSIFICATION
AppDB.OneLineDescription: table configures whether packet is LQ/CQ/DE/TYP

AppDB.Name: LATENCY_EGRESS_MAINTAIN_AVERAGE_LATENCY
AppDB.OneLineDescription: table configures whether packet is LQ/CQ/DE/TYP

AppDB.Name: LATENCY_EGRESS_PROBABILITY_MAPPING
AppDB.OneLineDescription: table configures
